comments.comment: OMG..... WHAT A BIG LIE.  Cobra has swam the dirty river water and one snake has just enter the plastic bottle. Good he took a plastic bottle. Otherwise he couldn't prove the incident. And sacred relic has appeared in his hand which were together. Look at the way he is explaining it. Smiling. He has won the biggest liar award. Cobra didn't have any place to bring the secret relics other than the dirty river water mixed with poop and pee. Also they knew cobras were coming too. He was holding the guy under water and Dhathu has come to his hands. Looks like he had 4 hands. Must have sent extra hands from Naga loka. Planned story wasn't planned well. Priest would have made up that story differently. Cobra should have brought the relics not to this man's dirty hands but in front of Chayithya or Buddha statue. LOL
